DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to determine whether rinsing with water or cleansing teeth after topical fluoride therapy affect the dental plaque pH.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Water Rinsing After Topical Fluoride Application on Dental Plaque pH
DOC.criteria: healthy people (Without any systemic disease) normal unstimulated salivary rate Active dental caries taking any medication with any effect on saliva rate taking antibiotic (or antibacterial mouth rinses) during last 4 weeks usig fluoride mouth rinses during last 2 weeks.
